entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Taloyoak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:48 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -20.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Taloyoak Airport 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -20.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -34
Dewpoint: -22.6°C
Wind: S 38 km/h gust 47 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow and blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 22.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blizzard developing early this evening and ending late this evening then snow. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 32 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then clearing. Blowing snow at times in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 32 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 46 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 46 in the evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023
